samples.name: Default Functionalities
samples.description: A simple, lightweight, and easily customizable DateTimePicker component for JavaScript (TypeScript) for selecting specific date and time values based on your needs

samples.name: Disabled Dates
samples.description: Customizable DateTimePicker widget for JavaScript (TypeScript) with disabled dates and times that restrict selection for specific date and time durations

samples.name: DateTime Range
samples.description: Flexible DateTimePicker component for TypeScript that restricts date selection from a defined range of values like the current month, past dates, next week, future dates, etc

samples.name: Format
samples.description: Flexible DateTimePicker for JavaScript (TypeScript) with options to customize date and time formats based on the preferred culture for improved readability

samples.name: Special Dates
samples.description: DateTimePicker for TypeScript that highlights multiple dates like weekends, holidays, special events, and time durations with options to add custom styles and descriptions
